bibl.title: Some Reflections on the Controversial Identity of the "presbus" in Euripides' "Trojan Women" (v. 921) and in His "Alexander" (Fr. 43, Col. III, 12).
bibl.note: Concerne aussi l'hypothesis de l'Alexandros: P. Oxy. LII, 3650 [ed.: Revel A. Coles, BICS Suppl. 32 (London, 1974)].
bibl.seg: Huys Marc, Some Reflections on the Controversial Identity of the "presbus" in Euripides' "Trojan Women" (v. 921) and in His "Alexander" (Fr. 43, Col. III, 12).
Concerne aussi l'hypothesis de l'Alexandros: P. Oxy. LII, 3650 [ed.: Revel A. Coles, BICS Suppl. 32 (London, 1974)].
